StartJourney.title: Idea
StartJourney.content: All it takes is a million dollar idea, a vision and mission!Then boom, they can start taking themselves through these building blocks

StartJourney.title: Research
StartJourney.content: Detailed research about trends in market, finance and human psychology is a very crucia step.

StartJourney.title: Investment
StartJourney.content: Pitch in your idea and convince investors, capitalists and the crowd to fund your startup!Entrepreneurs need to be looking at a six-month time frame for a business plan

StartJourney.title: Promotion
StartJourney.content: Execute your idea with your dream team,have a vision for the business and grow it and scale it by promoting and marketing effectively.

StartJourney.title: Success
StartJourney.content: Enjoy the success, enhance and build your business and make a difference by contributing back to the society.
